summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Superbalanced Makeup Foundation is the smart makeup that adds moisture and subtracts oil where needed.
details: DetailsBenefitsSkin Types: Dry Combination, Combination Oily.Coverage: Moderate.Finish: Natural.Whether you're dry in the cheeks or oily in the T-zone, this innovative makeup delivers just what your skin needs for a naturally perfected look.Long-wearing, oil-free foundation is silky upon application.Sweat and humidity-resistant. Water-resistant, too.Dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested.Non-acnegenic.Allergy tested.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesOilFragranceItem 2153598How To UseApply after using your 3-Step Skin Care System. Start in center of face and blend outward with Foundation Brush or fingertips. Blend evenly for smooth, natural-looking coverage. For a seamless look, dampen fingertips and blend edges, especially along jawline.Remove with Clinique Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover.IngredientsCyclopentasiloxane, Water / Aqua / Eau, Butylene Glycol, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Dimethicone, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, PEG / PPG-18 / 18 Dimethicone, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Extract, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Tocopheryl Acetate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Coconut Acid, Isostearyl Neopentanoate, Cetyl PEG / PPG-10 / 1 Dimethicone, Hexyl Laurate, Lecithin, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Laureth-7, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Lauryl Methacrylate / Glycol Dimethacrylate Crosspolymer, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate, C9-15 Fluoroalcohol Phosphate, Silica, Sodium Chloride, Polyethylene, Alumina, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Polyaminopropyl Biguanide. May Contain: Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply after using your 3-Step Skin Care System. Start in center of face and blend outward with Foundation Brush or fingertips. Blend evenly for smooth, natural-looking coverage. For a seamless look, dampen fingertips and blend edges, especially along jawline.Remove with Clinique Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover.

reviews.headline: Love this foundation!
reviews.comments: I chose this foundation because my other go to foundations were suddenly burning my eyes. This has been great, my eyes aren't tearing anymore. I wish this had a pump, it would make it easier to get on my brush.

reviews.headline: Great customer service makes for return customers!
reviews.comments:
Customer service representative was wonderful!
She is the reason I purchased this item.

reviews.headline: Love this foundation
reviews.comments: Its my favorite be using it for a long time

reviews.headline: Unexpected Love
reviews.comments: I received a free bottle of this as a gift with my order last year. After a couple wears, I went on and bought another bottle. It wasnt until my 3rd bottle that I read all the claims. The claims are spot on! I kept telling people about this foundation. Because when it survives a summer in Florida without any issues, you tell everyone you know. I would tell people that I feel like I rarely get oily, but its also not drying. (I have normal to combo skin depending on the time of year). I could never truly describe what type of foundation this was until I came and read the claims. The ONLY con is the bottle itself and lack of a pump. I dont use this like a moisturizer and use my hands (weirds me out). So when pouring product on the back of my hand, its hard to control how much comes out. Other than that- I LOVE this foundation. Please dont ever discontinue!

reviews.headline: Light, even coverage
reviews.comments: I wanted a foundation that provides good coverage without being heavy or looking like I am wearing a lot of product. Clinique Superbalanced is exactly that! It provides light, natural looking coverage. Easy to sheer out or build.

reviews.headline: FOUDATION PRODUCT
reviews.comments: GREAT PRODUCT

reviews.headline: Does not stay on
reviews.comments: Poor coverage, poor bottle, my face gets oily and causes breakouts. Do not recommend.

reviews.headline: Great Service
reviews.comments: Love this makeup.  Girl that handled my order was great üëç.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: I love clinique products

reviews.headline: This a fantastic make up base!!!!
reviews.comments: Will continue to use this foundation. Annabelle ( Ulta consultant) thank you for the brilliant advice and recommendation!!!!

reviews.headline: Beware: doesn't work for fair skin
reviews.comments: I am very fair and i ordered the shade fair and was very disappointed. I ended up looking orange within 10 minutes and it started to seperate after only a few hours of wear. If you are pale I would recommend cliniques beyond perfecting foundation+conealor combo over this. That has excellent coverage and does not oxidize.

reviews.headline: Perfect Match and Coverage!
reviews.comments: This foundation works so nicely on my combination skin, and it looks very natural and fresh. The color is a perfect match for my skin tone and that bottle will last a long time. I apply it with a brush, which blends it thinly and evenly. I travel for a living, so I carry duplicates of my products along; and this product goes where I go!

reviews.headline: Great product. Wouldn't use anything else!
reviews.comments: Amazing product.

reviews.headline: I have used this product for many years.
reviews.comments: Over the years, I have found the brand Clinique to be consistently good quality.

reviews.headline: I've been using this foundation for years
reviews.comments: I've never used a foundation that is as silky with such great coverage.  And I have looked.  I'll keep using this.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Been using Clinique for over 50 years.

reviews.headline: switched from lancome
reviews.comments: I never thought I'd move on from lancome, but when they switched their formula, it didn't work for me anymore. Got a sample of this and switched over. Much cheaper than lancome and works with my skin well!

reviews.headline: Pretty good
reviews.comments: I chose this foundation as part of a gift. I was thrilled after the forst used. Very snooth and natural finish. I will definately buy it ahain.

reviews.headline: I've tried them all and this is my favorite!
reviews.comments: Holy Grail foundation. Does it all- looks very natural, covers well not heavy or greasy, does not settle into fine lines . Doesn't get shiny or show texture.  Great color match. My favorite foundation by far and I've practically tried them all!

reviews.headline: Oldie but still a fave
reviews.comments:
I tried this foundation years ago when it first released. I liked it well enough, used it up, but never repurchased at that time. I've been on a "skin tint" kick for a while now, but was looking for something with more coverage for an event this summer, and decided to try this again. So glad I did! This applies and blends easily, settles down to a nice satin finish (but can be manipulated with primer - dewy primer gives more glow, matte primer takes the satin finish down). I have dry skin and it didn't cling or emphasize dryness. I also have mature skin (48) and this looked nice on all my areas of fine lines. It lasts well for a normal day. No irritation or breakouts. 

The big CON: the shades run dark and a bit cool toned. I don't mind the undertones since I lean cooler complexion, but the shade Ivory is about two shades darker than other brands' ivory shade. I've been using this quite a bit all summer, but will likely have to set it aside for winter as the shade is too dark.

media.headline: I want to buy again super balanced
Love this product
media.caption: It's all about the foundation baby!!!

media.headline: People cannot guess my age a testimony of 45 yrs of Clinique
media.caption: Keep Them Guessing!

faceoff_positive.comments:
I've found Superbalanced Makeup to be a truly
wonderful product. The coverage is light, yet effective. It never collects in my skin creases, and keeps me looking fresh and lovely all day long. As a 53 year old professional, I don't have time to wonder if my makeup needs to be touched up before an afternoon meeting. I apply
Superbalanced Makeup in the morning and have confidence all day long that I look my best.
faceoff_positive.headline: Superwonderful Makeup

faceoff_negative.comments:
I have been using Superbalanced Makeup from Clinique since I have been in my 30's and loved it. For some reason now, the formula seems to be thicker and looks "mask- like". I asked the Clinique specialist at the store if she knew of it changing and she was not aware. When at Ulta the other day, another woman told me she experienced the same with her new bottle and has moved to another brand of foundation. I did notice that my old bottle said "Made in the US" and now the new ones say "Made in Canada".

I am sad that I can no longer use Superbalanced and now have to change brands. Clinique- if you did change an ingredient or formula, please bring back the old version.

Sad to go!
faceoff_negative.headline: Something change with the formula of this product?
